item.title: Markdown writing tools
item.description: Since starting to write using Markdown it has become, as I have commented, an obsession with me. I currently use Nota to write and organize all of my work and while it is quite good it doesn’t have everything that I want. Primarily, it currently doesn’t have any Shortcuts or AppleScript support which makes plugging it into an automated workflow trickier than needed.
